originalText.text: It advertised an "Early Bird Special" but still charged me $95 for less than 5 hours. It appears that ANYTHING bigger than a Smart Car is an OVERSIZED VEHICLE. It's nothing short of a robbery to park there.

originalText.text:
I used to be a monthly member here. The parking lot staff and manager had extremely rude and arrogant service, even attempting to forcefully ask for tips. Additionally, as members, the monthly fees skyrocketed from $500 to $650 within just one year. Truly speechless.
Not even one star.

I used to be a monthly member here. The parking lot staff and manager had extremely rude and arrogant service, even attempting to forcefully ask for tips. Additionally, as members, the monthly fees skyrocketed from $500 to $650 within just one year. Truly speechless.
Not even one star.

originalText.text: AVOID THIS PLACE! THEY STEAL FROM YOU! I took my ID and credit card out of my wallet but left the wallet and purse in my car. When I got back, I realized someone had gone through my wallet because it was in a different place in my bag and a bunch of the cards were shoved back in the wrong places where they didn't fit. I had to cancel my backup credit card. Fortunately, I had my main card and my ID with me and I didn't have gift cards in my purse. Could have been worse! We've parked at places all over Manhattan and never had this problem before. Don't park here! It's not worth it!

originalText.text:
I would not recommend parking here.  It was a convenient location, easy to use on SpotHero, and good tech for entry/exit, but that was not enough to overcome the downsides.  The pricing was fairly standard for NYC, but also not worth these problems.

- I got to the top level and was awkwardly told by the attendant that he would park my car even though there were several spots where I could have self parked.
- On pickup, the elevator stopped several times between floors.  We finally were able to get out, but it was nerve-racking and we then had to walk to the top level.
- At the top level, there was no attendant, so had to walk back down to find someone.  We waited about 5 minutes for someone to show up.
- The guy that showed up asked if we had our car keys, so clearly other folks are just able to self park and not have an attendant park the car.
- He then offered to get our car for us, but took another 5+ minutes to do what should have been a 2 minute effort at most.
